`write`
 will join values by.

The infix, added between the timestamp and the message.

The text colors.
The logger format options.

The logger options for the debug level, used when calling 
ILogger.debug
.

The logger options for the error level, used when calling 
ILogger.error
.

The logger options for the critical level, used when calling 
ILogger.fatal
.

The logger options for the info level, used when calling 
ILogger.info
.

.

LoggerLevel
.

`null`
 to disable timestamp parsing.
The logger options.

The default options used to fill all the possible values for 
format

The inspect depth when logging objects.

The options for each log level. LogLevel.None serves to set the default for all keys, where only

LoggerTimestampOptions.timestamp
 and 
LoggerLevelOptions.prefix
 would be overridden.
The string that joins different messages.
The minimum log level.
